phrases: It is the start of Inuyasha!
We are going to gatherall the shards of the Sacred Jewel...
and I will destroy Naraku with my Tetsusaiga!
The land of herancestors was destroyed
and heryounger brother, Kohaku, has fallen into Naraku's hands.
But Sango has a cute, dependable friend, Kirara, who is always by her side.
Ourfriend Kirara is a feline demon with two tails!
When she battles, she grows in size and even flies through the air.
But usually, she has the appearance of a lovable, little kitty.
She is very good-natured and endures the willful ways of the others.
But once in a while, you should teach everyone a lesson, Kirara!
I woke up to find her gone.
Maybe she went for a walk.
Kirara is not one to go off without telling me.
She is at that rebellious stage.
Just'cuz she is gone awhile are not no reason to panic!
We cannot be worrying about every little thing!
Just leave her alone and she will be back in awhile.
Now it would be different with anotherkid I know.
Just who do you mean, Inuyasha!
Kagome, Sango... this fish is done.
Who said she would be right back?
Have you forgotten what you said earlier?
I am going to look for Kirara.
This is where Inuyasha steps in.
She uses this to eat cat food.
And what'm I supposed to do with that?
I thought maybe you should sniff it.
In any case, let us split up and search.
The end of her scent means that she flew away.
Besides, I do not catch any scent of Kirara around here.
Still, we cannot just ignore it.
Sango, do not you have any ideas?
Like you had a fight or Kirara knows someone around here.
Like she lost her appetite... or was moody lately.
Or maybe there is a large patch of catnip growing nearhere?
I always go to battle and drag her along without thinking twice about her.
When we need to go a distance,
we take herforgranted and ride her.
I make hergo on errands and do not reward her.
Even her favorite fish... she only gets a rare treat of it.
Sango, do not blame yourself so much.
Kirara's not the type to run away over that.
When Inuyasha teased me earlier, I realized it.
It is obvious when you think about it.
Kirara had enough of all of you...
Come out and say it instead of dragging it out like that.
Put yourhand on yourheart and think hard.
Can you truly say that you have never been mean to Kirara?!
I cannot think of anything I did.
I will outline yourvery acts of thoughtlessness...
you practiced the Wind Scar on Kirara!
It is okay, it is okay.
Thinking back, she did have some bald spots.
If you thought no one was watching, you are mistaken!
Kirara's bald spots were caused by you, Inuyasha?
That is putting all the blame on me!
Kirara's probably forgotten all about it by now!
Then you are saying there is another because?
Miroku, do not say you have forgotten.
It is time foryou to appear on the scene, Kirara.
Such a manly monk you are!
Please spend the night in this village.
You cannot take advantage of her.
And you nevertook advantage of her, Kagome?
No, I do not have a test.
I will give you flounder and tuna-flavored cat treats.
Why did you go back home that time?
But unlike that water imp hand, this is genuine.
On top of which, I completely forgot the treats!
I hope you have learned yourlesson
and will not be mean to an innocent demon ever again.
If you evergive me a noogie again...
you will not get Kagome's snacks for one week!
That is not for you to decide!
We did not mean anything bad.
I am in no position to criticize.
I would turn overin my sleep and smother her...
When I am in a bad mood,
I would make her fly across the night sky.
I would make her transform just so she could light the camp fire.
Grab her paws several times a day...
Pinch her nose while she was asleep...
Dress her up just for kicks...
To even think you could leave my territory.
This forest has so little food.
I came here thinking it was Kirara...
but it is only a baboon wannabe and a mortal.
Bastard, you dare let my prey go!
Bones are scattered all over there.
As if I would rememberwho I have eaten.
I will let you join herright away...
He uses the counteraction of the tree branches to move at high speed.
And he attacks from a high altitude which is always fail-safe.
If only Kirara were here now.
From now on, you must take care of her.
You are just a petty demon that jumps around a lot.
Do not think that you can defeat me
simply by taking down the tree branches!
We should have cherished Kirara more dearly.
It is been a while, Inuyasha!
Totosai bade me bring a whetstone for
How did you carry such a heavy stone?
I asked Kirara to help bring it here.
I came all this way and rode Kirara back to Totosai's hut.
It is been a long time!
I know it is sudden, but I need yourhelp.
What are you doing at this hour?
We will be back in one day.
We do not have any time to waste.
Hope you are ready forthis, Shippo!
Let us hurry and get out of here.
If you go alone, you may get out alive.
Do not give up so easily!
In orderto escape, we have to join forces.
Next on Inuyasha: Kikyo and Kagome: Alone in the Cave
Oh, the warmth of someone who lives.
Is this the source of Kagome's strength?
